product_name: The North Face Midtown Tote - 2012 Closeout
long_description: For those days that have you running all over town, the durable North Face Midtown tote has plenty of storage to hold your laptop, books or files, and a couple of water bottles as well. Features a large main compartment with slip-in pockets and padded laptop sleeve (fits most 15" laptops). Zip top; side water bottle pockets with cinch closures. The North Face Midtown tote has a front zip pocket with magnetic flap closure. Closeout.
short_description: For those days that have you running all over town, the durable North Face Midtown tote has plenty of storage to hold your laptop, books or files, and a couple of water bottles as well.
